entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
